import React from 'react'; import '../App.css'; class Table extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { hashValues: ['X', 'O'], index: 1, tab11: '', tab12: '', tab13: '', tab21: '', tab22: '', tab23: '', tab31: '', tab32: '', tab33: '', } } changeStateValue(index, tabValue) { this.setState({ index: index ? 0 : 1, [tabValue]: this.state.hashValues[index], }); this.validateWinnerHash(); } validateWinnerHash() { const accessState = this.state; const stateValues = [ [ accessState.tab11, accessState.tab12, accessState.tab13, ], [ accessState.tab21, accessState.tab22, accessState.tab23, ], [ accessState.tab31, accessState.tab32, accessState.tab33, ], [ accessState.tab11, accessState.tab21, accessState.tab31, ], [ accessState.tab12, accessState.tab22, accessState.tab32, ], [ accessState.tab13, accessState.tab23, accessState.tab33 ], [ accessState.tab11, accessState.tab22, accessState.tab33, ], [ accessState.tab13, accessState.tab22, accessState.tab31 ] ] } render() { console.log(this.state) return (
this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab11')}>

{this.state.tab11}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab12')}>

{this.state.tab12}

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab13')}>

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab22')}>

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab23')}>

this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab31')}>

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab32')}>

 this.changeStateValue(this.state.index, 'tab33')}>

{this.state.tab33}
); } } export default Table;
